metadata.title: CVE-2024-35992 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:phy: marvell: a3700-comphy: Fix out of bounds readThere is an out of bounds read access of 'gbe_phy_init_fix[fix_idx].addr'every iteration after 'fix_idx' reaches 'ARRAY_SIZE(gbe_phy_init_fix)'.Make sure 'gbe_phy_init[addr]' is used when all elements of'gbe_phy_init_fix' array are handled.Found by Linux Verification Center (linuxtesting.org) with SVACE.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
